about_the_game:
Run Run Run

Run, jump, dodge, accumulate points or just disturb the other players, BUT RUN AWAY FROM THE CROCODILE!





In Run Run Run the players compete against each other or during battles in exchange for points that can be converted into coins used to customize your character.

Multiplayer


On Battle Multiplayer, the player runs against other players to decide who is the best. You can play with your friends as a team or solo.

Drone Wars


Dodge, shoot, destroy enemy drones and conquer the skies. In the Drone mode, you need to dodge and destroy enemies that come in rounds, being able to collect powerups that will help you during the game. Each round is more challenging than the last. How far can you take it?

Dot Smash


Little Dots are made to be smashed, so why not help? Crush as many of them as you can, to get the highest score. The color of each Little Dot has a different effect, which can create unusual situations.

Score Attack


In Score Attack mode, the more the player runs, the more points he gets! They can even raise the score by collecting turbo or hitting the crocodile with the broom powerup.

Survival


In this mode, you must survive through the rounds, dodging obstacles, holes and other hazards in the city, while still worrying about the crocodile.
Show that you are the best and survive the most rounds!

Ranking

Your best scores will be stored in your local ranking, and you can compare them with the global ranking. How about challenging your friends and see who’s on top?

Character Customization

Run run run features a character customization system, on which the player can change their character’s clothes, choose hair details, effects and eye colors. These are some of the many options available to customize your character and leave it as you want.

name: Run Run Run

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: i3 2100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Run, jump, dodge, accumulate points or just disturb the other players, BUT RUN AWAY FROM THE CROCODILE!
